General.Name: Rayhoo Motor Dies Co Ltd
General.Description: Rayhoo Motor Dies Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells stamping dies and auto welding lines in China and internationally. It offers stamping die inspection, automation line, lightweight, and parts plates. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Wuhu, China.
General.Address: No. 22 Yinhu Road North, Wuhu, China, 241000
